events.name: MMA FORUM SINGAPORE 2017
events.description: MMA FORUM SINGAPORE 2017, a 1 day event hosted by Mobile Marketing Association, Inc. You must register with the event to book your seat. Description: Media consumption has changed radically, and today mobile is moving at light speed and catalysing business innovation and transformation around the world. The MMA Singapore Forum 2017 will focus on how mobile is being redefined – on the radical, transformational, pervasive changes in the ways companies market and sell their products and services. More than a communications channel, more than a device, mobile is the ultimate disruptor and the gateway through which many consumers experience a brand. It’s also a mechanism that allows brands to understand and connect with consumers in ways never before possible. More information: http://www.mmaglobal.com/forumsingapore2017 Agenda: Friday, June 9 8:00 AM – 9:10 AM - Registration & Breakfast 9:15 AM – 9:35 AM - Welcome from MMA 9:35 AM – 9:55 AM - Hooked on Mobile 9:55 AM – 10:20 AM - How to Combat Ad-Blocking through Creativity 10:20 AM – 10:40 AM - Doing Mobile Video Right 10:40 AM – 11:00 AM - Networking Break 11:00 AM – 11:25 AM - Mobile’s Hierarchy of Needs 11:25 AM – 11:45 AM - Smarter Marketing with Machine Learning 11:45 AM – 12:05 PM - Using Technology and Storytelling to Build Media Brands 12:05 PM – 12:45 PM - Brand's New Day: Joining the Programmatic Revolution 12:45 PM – 1:45  - Lunch 1:45 PM – 2:10 PM - Accelerating Digital Transformation Impact with Agile Marketing 2:10 PM – 2:30 PM - Unifying chat, social, commerce and ads: Why mobile messaging apps represent the new face of social media 2:30 PM – 2:50 PM - Being People Centric and #MobileBest 2:50 PM – 3:10 PM - Mobile Innovation as The Catalyst for Change 3:10 PM – 3:45 PM - Networking Break 3:50 PM – 4:10 PM - Marketing Attribution Think Tank 4:10 PM – 4:30 PM - Converting Consumer Loyalty, Coupon, and Offer Programs to Mobile 4:30 PM – 5:00 PM - Panel: Fuelling Your Supercharged Retargeting Campaigns with Better Data 5:00 PM – 5:10 PM - Closing Remarks 5:30 PM - Cocktails ****You must register with the event to book your seat**** Register here: http://www.mmaglobal.com/forumsingapore2017/register For deeper engagement with Apache Apex, download, view past meetup webinars, slides, and docs.  To reduce time to market, look at operable app-templates that you can quickly import and launch.  Examples: HDFS-Sync, Kafka-HDFS, HDFS-Line-Copy, S3-HDFS and HDFS-Kafka. Free DataTorrent Enterprise Edition for qualifying startups. Check it out! Brought to you by DataTorrent, creators of Apache Apex.
events.location: Atrium, Pan Pacific Hotel, 7 Raffles Boulevard, Marina Square, Singapore 039595
events.group_name: Next Gen Native Hadoop Big Data Apex Users Group, Singapore

events.name: ArtScience on Screen: Anime Season – Spirited Away
events.description:
ArtScience on Screen: Anime Season – Spirited Away

Spirited Away is a fantasy anime about a 10-year-old girl who unknowingly enters fantastical spirit world ruled by strange creatures. When her parents are transformed into pigs, the young determined heroine tries to release them from their curse by taking a job working in a mysterious bathhouse. She then goes on a liminal journey through the realm of spirits in which nothing is what it seems. 

In conjunction with Children’s Season, ArtScience on Screen presents this extraordinary, award-winning animated classic from iconic animation company, Studio Ghibli. Enjoy this masterpiece of astounding visual beauty and imagination from the unrivaled dream factory running this June.

Dates and Screening Times: 
9-11, 14-15 June: at 10.30am, 12.35pm, 2.40pm, & 4.45pm
Rating: PG
Running time: 2 hours 5 minutes
 
Venue: Expression Gallery, Level 4
Free Admission

#ArtScienceOnScreen

events.name: 0x Project on Ethereum: Will Warren and Amir Bandeali
events.description:
https://www.0xproject.com/ One of the most anticipated upcoming projects is 0x. The 0x protocol will act as a critical piece of infrastructure for the token economy, allowing Ethereum smart contracts to programmatically and seamlessly exchange Ethereum-based assets. This decentralized protocol will be key in enhancing the interoperability of assets so that dapps can autonomously trade, and more importantly access and utilize, the entire landscape of Ethereum tokens natively (imagine being in Status.im chat and you want more info on another person; by sending a request in Status.im, you could autonomously access Uport's ID database, and even pay users tokens to feed their personal data back to you via Status). It's an ambitious project, and one we're excited to have the Ethereum community learn more about.  


Organizers:
